mapper.sql: id, tcp_name, tcp_value, tcp_type, tcp_description, device_type, device_item_value, cmd_name, group_type
mapper.select: select c1.tcp_value as tcp_value, c2.device_item_value as device_item_value, c2.tcp_description as tcp_description FROM sys_cmd_tcp c2 LEFT JOIN sys_cmd_tcp c1 on c2.group_type=c1.cmd_name where c1.tcp_type is NOT null
select count(id) from sys_cmd_tcp where group_type=#{cmdName} and ( device_item_value=#{deviceItemValue} or tcp_description=#{tcpDescription} )

select id, device_item_value, tcp_description from sys_cmd_tcp where group_type=(select tcp.cmd_name from sys_cmd_tcp tcp where tcp.id=#{id})
order by ${field} ${type}
SELECT cmd_name AS cmdName FROM sys_cmd_tcp WHERE tcp_value = #{cmd}
SELECT tcp_description as tcpDescription , device_item_value as deviceItemValue FROM sys_cmd_tcp WHERE group_type = #{cmdName}
SELECT cmd_name AS cmdName, tcp_value AS tcpValue FROM sys_cmd_tcp WHERE tcp_value IS NOT NULL
